reviewText: This was purchased as a gift
DVD with games shows on it from the 1950's and 1960's great to watch again grew up with these shows back then
Loved it. Just as advertised. It is VERY difficult finding these old game shows on DVD, so I'm glad these were available.
This was worth it all! I bought this for my mother-in-law for Christmas. She and I watched it and loved every minute of it! Great shows and so fun to watch!!
